twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account using an authenticator app
twoFactor.setupInstructions: Please download an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy to complete the setup.

privateKey.title: Export Private Key
privateKey.description: Exporting your private key gives you direct control and security over your funds. This is applicable if you've signed up via email.
privateKey.warning: DO NOT share your private key with anyone. We will never ask for your private key.
privateKey.step1: Start the process below and sign into Magic.Link
privateKey.step2: Export your private key and securely store the private key displayed.
